short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights SEO-related links and shows their attributes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Link Highlighter is a powerful Chrome extension that helps SEO professionals, web developers, and content creators analyze and visualize different types of links on web pages.

Key Features:
• Visual highlighting of different link types:
  - Follow links (green)
  - Nofollow links (red)
  - Sponsored links (orange)
  - UGC links (blue)

• Real-time Statistics:
  - Total links count
  - Follow/Nofollow distribution
  - Sponsored and UGC links
  - Internal vs External links

• Easy-to-use Interface:
  - One-click enable/disable
  - Customizable highlight colors
  - Dark mode interface
  - Keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+H)

• Advanced Features:
  - Right-click context menu for link info
  - Automatic updates for dynamic content
  - Synchronized settings across devices
  - Tooltip information for each link

Perfect for:
• SEO professionals analyzing link attributes
• Content creators managing outbound links
• Web developers auditing link relationships
• Digital marketers tracking sponsored content

The extension is lightweight, privacy-focused, and requires minimal permissions to function.

Developed by BAGASPR (https://bagaspr.link)
